Pierre Gendron (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pierre_Gendron_(actor) 0 Pierre Gendron (born Leon Pierre Gendron, March 4, 1896 – November 27, 1956) was an American actor and screenwriter. Pierre_Gendron ( born Leon_Pierre_Gendron , March_4_,_1896 – November_27_,_1956 ) was an_American_actor_and_screenwriter .
